metaTitle: Mortgage calculator – estimate your monthly payment
metaDescription: Estimate your monthly mortgage payment, total interest and overall costs. Includes legal notes and an entry point for financial partners.

hero.title: How much will your home cost per month?
hero.subtitle: Our mortgage calculator gives you a first indication of what a property might cost you per month – before you talk to a bank.

results.title: Result (simplified example only)
results.disclaimer: All results are non-binding examples and do not replace individual advice from a bank or licensed advisor.

features.title: Quick orientation
features.text: Get a first feeling whether a property roughly fits your budget before requesting official offers.

features.title: Transparent breakdown
features.text: Monthly payment, total costs and interest are shown separately so you can better understand the impact.

features.title: Test different scenarios
features.text: Play with interest rates, equity and term and instantly see how your monthly payment changes.

features.title: Basis for professional advice
features.text: Use the results as talking points with your bank, mortgage broker or tax advisor.

legalText: This calculator provides a non-binding, strongly simplified example. It does not replace legal, tax or financial advice.
legalNotes: This is a strongly simplified example calculation with no claim to completeness.
Actual loan conditions (interest, fees, special repayments, fixed-rate period etc.) are determined by banks and licensed advisors.
The calculation is not a financing offer, not an approval and not a regulatory investment recommendation.
For binding information, please contact your bank, a licensed mortgage broker or your tax advisor.
MyHome24App does not currently grant loans itself and only provides an orientation tool for users.
legalPoints: MyHome24App does not grant loans and does not provide investment or tax advice.
For binding information, please contact your bank, financing broker or tax advisor.
Regulatory obligations remain with the respective financing providers.

partnerSection.title: Financial partners & mortgage advisors
partnerSection.text: You are a bank or independent mortgage advisor and would like to work with MyHome24App? We are planning a dedicated partner area where trusted providers can present their services to our users.

partnerCallouts.title: For banks
partnerCallouts.text: Show your regional and national mortgage products right where users are searching for homes.

partnerCallouts.title: For brokers
partnerCallouts.text: Offer tailored advice for complex financing cases and build long-term client relationships.

partnerCallouts.title: For users
partnerCallouts.text: Users can quickly find the right contact person instead of comparing dozens of offers on their own.

partner.title: Work with financing partners
partner.subtitle: You are a bank, broker or independent advisor and would like to present your financing solutions via MyHome24App?
partner.banksText: Present your regional or national mortgage products directly next to suitable properties.
partner.brokersText: Position yourself as a personal contact for complex cases – from first orientation to closing.
partner.clientsText: Users find the right contact faster and save time when searching for offers.
partner.leadSuccess: Your financing request has been saved. This calculator does not replace financial advice – our partners may contact you if needed.
partner.leadError: We could not save your request. Please try again later.

partnerPage.seoDescription: Information for banks, brokers and advisors who want to offer financing via MyHome24App.

hero.title: Show your financing solutions where people search for homes
hero.subtitle: MyHome24App combines property search with first financing ideas. Join our partner network and present your products in the right context.

partnerPage.intro: We are planning a dedicated partner area where reputable providers can present their financing products in a transparent and comparable way. Together we want to help users find the right financing contact faster – without replacing personal advice.

segments.title: For banks
segments.text: Increase your visibility among users actively searching for property and place your rate models in the right environment.

segments.title: For brokers
segments.text: Position yourself as a contact for complex financing cases – transparent and on equal footing with your clients.

segments.title: For advisors
segments.text: Use the calculator as a conversation starter and discuss chances and risks together with your clients.

benefits.title: More qualified leads
benefits.text: Users have already thought about budget and payment before they contact you – this saves time in the first consultation.

benefits.title: Clear responsibilities
benefits.text: All binding offers are made solely by you as the regulated provider. MyHome24App only offers orientation.

benefits.title: Joint development
benefits.text: We build new features together with our partners – from additional calculator options to information areas for users.

faq.a: No. The calculator only provides a rough example calculation. Personal advice from a bank, broker or tax advisor is still essential.

faq.q: Who is the contract partner of the customer?
faq.a: The contractual partner for any loan agreement is always the respective bank or financing broker, not MyHome24App.
After your request we discuss your goals and target groups, then we check if and how a cooperation makes sense.

cta.registerHint: Register interest in future partner onboarding

partnerPage.footerText: Send us a short message with your products and regions. We will get back to you with ideas for possible cooperation models.
